vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀλῡσῐ-τελής, ές,
unprofitable, [Refs 5th c.BC+] W.; of a person, ἀ. τῇ πόλει[Refs 3rd c.BC+]: superlative -έστατος[Refs 4th c.BC+]. adverb -λῶς[Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II in Medicine texts, unfavourable, of symptoms, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
unadvantageous, without special benefit
primarily bringing in no revenue or profit; hence, unprofitable, useless, without advantage or benefit; detrimental; ruinous, disastrous, Heb. 13:17*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: que no aprovecha ni ayuda, no ser provechoso
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: không ích lợi; không có lợi; bất lợi
